description: sketch; three figures--foreground head and torso slumped, with head supported by figure at right; standing figure at left; large shadowy areas of ink wash
medium: Pen and brown ink and wash on laid paper
provenance: 'Earl Beauchamp. Sale, Sotheby's, London, June 11, 1981, no. 144. [Colnaghi, London, until 1982; sold July 22, as Lamentation of Christ, for £1,500, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1982-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Death of Hyacinth
